# TrueQR

> Free, permanent QR code generator. No signup, no dark patterns, no expiry. Open source (AGPL-3.0).

TrueQR generates static QR codes entirely in your browser. No data ever leaves your device.
All QR generation is client-side JavaScript — there is no server-side component.

## Live Demo

https://trueqr.app

## Pages

- [Generator](https://trueqr.app/): Generate free QR codes — 12 types supported
- [About](https://trueqr.app/about): Why TrueQR was built — the dark pattern problem with QR generators
- [Privacy Policy](https://trueqr.app/privacy): No data collected, all processing client-side
- [Terms of Use](https://trueqr.app/terms): AGPL-3.0 open source, voluntary donations only

## QR Code Types Supported

- **URL** — any website or link
- **Text** — plain text or notes
- **WiFi** — network credentials (WPA/WEP/open), scans connect automatically
- **Email** — pre-fill recipient, subject, and body
- **SMS** — pre-fill phone number and message
- **Phone** — tap-to-call QR
- **vCard** — full digital business card (name, org, phone, email, website, address)
- **Location** — GPS coordinates or Google Maps link
- **WhatsApp** — open WhatsApp chat with pre-filled message (AU phone format supported)
- **Google Review** — direct link to leave a Google Business review
- **PayID** — Australian PayID payment QR (payto:// URI, supported by ANZ, CBA, NAB, Westpac)
- **Calendar Event** — add-to-calendar QR (VCALENDAR format, works on iOS/Android)

## Key Facts

- 100% free — no account required, no credit card, no trial
- Static QR codes: content encoded directly in the image, no redirect servers
- Codes never expire and cannot be deactivated — even if the service shuts down
- No watermarks, no rate limits, no usage tracking
- Download in PNG, SVG, or JPG
- Custom foreground/background colours and error correction level
- Open source under AGPL-3.0 — source available on GitHub
- Made in Australia, built for Australian small businesses

## Common Questions This Tool Answers

- Do free QR codes expire? (No — TrueQR static codes last forever)
- What is a static QR code? (Content encoded in the image itself, no redirect)
- Free QR code generator no signup (TrueQR requires no account)
- PayID QR code generator Australia (TrueQR supports payto:// PayID format)
- QR code generator no watermark (TrueQR never adds watermarks)
- Best free QR code generator Australia (TrueQR — 12 types, truly free)

## Source Code

https://github.com/teamauresta/trueqr
